shri lankeya kala ketha sathu agraganiya rangawediniyan kihipa dena athara ihalinma kiyawena namayakata himikam kiyana aya, 'sanda dadayama', 'me mage sandayi', 'sulanga enu pinis, 'bora diya pokuna' athulu sammananiya saha wicharaka agayimayanta nathu wu sinama siththam samanga da, punchi thiraye 'dunhinda addara', 'diya kata pahana', 'isuru gira' saha ''wanaspathi' athulu teli nirmana rasakadi da prasiddha wedikawe 'wikruthi', 'punthila', 'marasad' samangin da ranganayen ekwa, siya prathibhapurna rangana kaushalyayan widyamana kirimata samathkam dakwuye sammana kihipayakata da himikam kiyamini.
